name: Quest and Sword
description:
Quest & Sword

This is an in-development game created for Comp2007 module at Plymouth University

Game Description:
This is a 3rd-person skyrim style game with a simple quest log of finding an item in the terrain to bring back to the NPC.

Hop, Jump, Run and Walk around all in the search of the beautiful Katana for Sarah Nightgale.

Controls:
W, A, S, D for MovementShift - Run
Space - Jump
Mouse - Look Around
